transcript:
Customer: convince kar lenge aapko turant.
Customer: mila nahi hai abhi tak do teen baar.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji Sarfaraz ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: ha Sarfaraz se baat ho rahi hai sir.
Executive: From ETS construction?
Customer: Haan ji sir bataiye.
Executive: Sir ek zaruri baat karni thi aapse main actually business manager baat kar raha hun Vivek Mishra from IndiaMART.
Customer: Ji bataiye sir.
Executive: Haan bataiye sir aapne I think call kiya hua tha team ko hamare.
Customer: Haan team ko call kiya hai actually jo maine registration aap logon se le rakha hai paid service le rakhi hai isko cancellation ke regarding kiya.
Executive: Cancellation ke liye?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Kyun sir abhi to aap recently onboard hue hain IndiaMART pe?
Customer: Sir actually na mere ko kahin na kahin zarurat hai hi nahi hai iski.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Hmm. Aisa kyun sir?
Customer: Bas mujhe lag raha hai aisa bilkul jo hai mere paas koi inquiry ya koi business to aa nahi raha hai isse aur na hi aaya hai kabhi pehle.
Executive: Sir aapke conflict hua tha shayad buyer supplier ka ke sath matlab to us hisab se agar dekha jaaye sir to aisa thodi hai ki business nahi hai sir platform pe.
Customer: Haan bilkul mera hua tha aur jo hai bilkul hua hai wo abhi bhi pending hai wo.
Executive: Uska koi resolution nahi hai.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: Uska koi resolution nahi hai sir wo hua tha wo jo bhi hua tha wo pending hai abhi aise hi.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur dusra mere paas jo hai abhi talak koi bhi aapki. Kyunki sir hamare yahan aisa koi refund policy to nahi hai sir matlab. Sir refund refund policy. Bilkul refund policy hai.
Executive: Kyun sir aapko kisne bola ye cheez?
Customer: Mere ko jis time maine liya hai us time meri sari baat chit hui thi.
Executive: Kya bola gaya tha aapko?
Customer: Bola gaya hai bola sir aapko agar aisa lagta hai aap jo hai 90 days ke andar andar aap refund bhi le sakte ho.
Executive: Achcha. Ye aapse kahin kuch written form mein sir aisa kuch bola gaya hai?
Customer: Nahi mere paas written form mein nahi hai but main check bhi nahi kiya. Sir ye to bahut bada statement hai agar koi aapko keh raha hai ki aapka refund ho jayega to.
Executive: Hmm koi bhi statement bol sakte hain sir jo hamare policy mein aur hamare uske against ho.
Customer: Hmm. To ab batao sir mujhe to ye refund chahiye aur cancellation chahiye kya karna hai iska refund to hai kyunki jab mere ko bola gaya tha mere ko jab ye bola gaya tha ki refundable hai to sir kyun nahi hai?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji ab sun pa raha hun bataiye.
Executive: Haan main ye keh raha hun agar sir aapko aisa kisi ne kuch bola hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To ye to generally sir ye to hona chahiye written form mein.
Customer: Bilkul bola hai sir mere ko.
Executive: Haan ji. Ji.
Executive: Bataiye.
Customer: To kyunki sir aap product line next one second.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To aapka sir product line mein main dekh raha hun ki hamare paas buyleads bhi hai inquiries bhi hai business bhi hai. Fir kya dikkat hai sir?
Customer: Nahi mere paas koi business nahi hai aur na hi mere paas koi inquiry aayi hai aap logon ki aur na ek bhi deal final hui hai meri to mujhe kyun rakhna hai mujhe nahi rakhna hai main to seedha bol raha hun sir.
Executive: Sir but isme to obviously baat hai sir time lagta hai business aapka pura. Nahi sir mere paas mere paas wo time nahi hai main wait nahi kar sakta aur mera jo hai ye aap cancel karo aur mera jo hai isko refund karke do please. Thik hai?
Executive: Sir wo jo aapka ek conflict tha buyer ke sath wo aapka solve ho gaya sir?
Customer: Nahi mera solve nahi hua hai uska solution maine dhoond liya hai kya karna hai mujhe wo main apne se solve kar lega sir usko. Thik hai sir?
Executive: Sir main wahi keh raha hun sir ki matlab is cheez ke upar humen hum ye jo decision bana rahe hain na sir ye hum bahut hari mein bana rahe hain.
Customer: Nahi main jo hai main koi bhi agar decision le raha hun main self decision lene wala hun aur main decision ekdam I think better le raha hun.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To mujhe kisi tarah ka koi doubt nahi hai.
Executive: Sir kyunki one second. Hmm.
Executive: Boundary wall construction services, hotel construction services, industrial flooring services. Isme to sir aapko hardly ek se do order chahiye sir aapne jo invest kiya hai aap ye waise hi nikal loge.
Customer: Nahi sir mere ko ye order nahi chahiye na. Main wahi to keh raha hun ki mujhe ye services aapki nahi chahiye mujhe order nahi chahiye.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Par sir aap ye soch ke thodi aaye hoge ki mere ko platform pe jana hai aur uske baad. Sir main to bilkul bilkul main platform pe pehli baar to aana hi nahi chahta tha aur but main aaya hun to ye cheez maine bola bhi tha ki main sir aapka jo hai do mahine tak wait karega last maximum do mahine tak meri koi bhi deal final nahi hoti hai koi bhi calls nahi aati hain to mujhe paisa ek ek paisa refund chahiye bola sir aapko paisa refund ho jayega koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: Achcha. Main to haan. To pura full paisa aapko. Unhone ye unhone us time us time pe mere ko ye bhi bataya gaya tha 90 days ka total time hota hai aapka refunder ka.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To mujhe abhi talak koi bhi mera koi order final nahi hua hai koi inquiry nahi aayi hai. Matlab aapko ye bola gaya tha ki jo bhi paisa amount hai aapka wo kat jayega uske hisab se. Haan wo refund ho jayega jitne time aapka service chala hai utne time ka aapka refund ho jayega ye bola gaya tha aapko.
Customer: Hmm. Mere ko service ka to unhone ye deduction ka to koi baat hi nahi hui meri aur unki jo baat hui hai wo ye hui hai ki aapka agar ek bhi order nahi hota hai two month ke andar andar to hum aapka payment jo hai total refund karke denge.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Achcha. Service ka deduction to aap tab karoge na mere paas agar ek mahine ₹10 ka bhi order aapka aaya ho. Haan. Tab to aapka right banta hai ki pure ko aap rakh sakte ho. Main bhi keh raha hun wo baat to but mere paas koi call yahan tak ki order to door ki baat hai koi call bhi nahi aayi hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Mere paas order to bahut door ki baat hai but mere call bhi nahi aayi hai.
Executive: Sir call nahi aaya hota to aapka wo buyer ko aap paisa kaise bhejte sir kaisi baat kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Kisko? Sir main main jo hai purchase hai wo mera sell nahi hai wo.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Wo mera purchase hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir main ek baar isko fir internally ek baar verify karta hun sir. Aur. Haan bilkul bilkul verify. Aur aap mujhe ye bata do sir kab tak refund ho jayega ye?
Executive: Jo bhi hai sir main abhi aapko kuch commit nahi karna chah raha main jo bhi hai ek baar check karke fir batata hun aapko.
Customer: Matlab kab tak bataoge sir?
Executive: Sir main ye week ek baar main dekhta hun sir kya ho sakta hai. Kya sir kya?
Executive: Sir ye week main dekhta hun ek baar kyunki. Sir week itna lamba lamba time mat do please.
Executive: Kyunki sir mujhe ek baar dekhna padega dekhiye sir pura refund to hum kabhi nahi karte. Haan. Aap commit bhi nahi kar rahe ho but aap mere se line time bhi bahut lamba mang rahe ho na itna lamba time sorry sir.
Executive: Main sir kuch bhi aapko aisa commit nahi kar sakta na kyunki aap bhi to kuch written form mein aap kuch nahi dikha rahe hain sir.
Customer: Written form mein koi aisa to hai nahi sir hamara baith kar ke by face hamara agreement sign hua hai bola ji aapne padha hai wo sab aisa to kuch hua nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi sir proposal aapko bheja gaya hai proposal aapne approve kiya hoga aisa thodi hai sir.
Customer: Main aapko bata raha hun na wahi baat aisa kuch nahi aaya hai mere paas sir dusri cheez ye hai aapne agar koi mail mal pe dali hui hogi to mere ko jo commitment us time bataya gaya hai to main uske hisab bihaf pe aap logon se apna refund mang raha hun bas only.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur but aap jo hai. Thik hai sir main dekhta hun. Mujhe aap sir kal evening tak ka jo hai reply do. Kal evening mein main aapko status batata hun kya ho sakta hai. Haan. Kal evening mein aap mere ko reply do ki mera jo hai kab talak aap refund kara doge sir. Last date. Thik hai. Thik hai. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants cancellation and refund of subscription.

- States no business or inquiries received.

- Claims verbal agreement for refund within 90 days.



Resolution:

- Executive will internally verify the details.

- Executive will provide an update next evening.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to provide status update next evening.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, cancellation, subscription, buyleads
